item.title: Joe's Cookies
item.description: The recipe doesn’t really say to add vanilla but I put in about 1 1/2 tsp of real vanilla. There aren’t many ingredients so I suggest using the best quality of each. There is a picture of balls of dough after I mixed it. They are too big make them about half the size I did. The one in my hand is the correct size. I make a mixture of half flour and half powdered sugar to dust the dough with.
